subject: Order SSN2812
description_text:
Hi, 
This order was confirmed on October 2nd, with express shipping. When can I expect delivery?
I look forward to hearing from you.
David 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi David Koffman,      We apologize for the delay. We are currently on an 8-day holiday break and will ship your order on the 9th. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Thanks for the response. 
I feel thereâ€™s an oversight on your part here and the delay is unfortunate for me because I needed the pedals quickly. 
I paid for a 2-3 day delivery. With that in mind please can you refund the express delivery charge?

Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi David Koffman,    Alright, we'll refund the extra shipping charges and continue using express logistics for your shipment. Here's your tracking link: https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3283812090148
